departments.description: One of a kind ground floor masterpiece, corner unit, completely renovated. Designed by a well known Brazilian architect. Approximately 5,000 Sq.Ft. Featuring 6 bedrooms, 6.5 bathrooms, 2 powder rooms. State of the art kitchen and bathrooms, window treatments, and floor-to-ceiling sliding Impact glass doors. Large terrace overlooking the Fisher Island Marina. Easy to show.

Welcome to 5-star palazzo del sol on the prestigious Fisher Island. Full service private residential island featuring several restaurants, beach club, world class golf, tennis, salon, and spa. Your private elevator opens up to this flow through 3 bed 3.5 bath unit boasts 3,793 sq. ft., 2 private terraces totaling 767 sq. ft. overlooking the Atlantic ocean & south point skyline. Open living/dining/great room perfect for entertaining. Upgrades include engineered oak flooring throughout, custom wallpaper, wood & stone accented walls, book-matched marble master bath with walk-in rain shower & boffi tub. Gourmet kitchen & large breakfast bar with luxury Gaggenau/Sub-Zero appliances, & granite countertops. Building amenities include gym, aperitivo bar, business center, theater, concierge, and more...

WELCOME TO SEASIDE AT FISHER ISLAND. A RARE OPPORTUNITY AWAITS YOU. ONE OF THE MOST DESIRED UNIT LOCATIONS IN ALL OF SEASIDE WITH DIRECT OCEAN VIEWS FROM MAIN LIVING AREA AND MASTER BEDROOM SUITE. THIS UPDATED UNIT BOASTS 2 BEDROOMS, BREAKFAST AREA AND 2 BATHROOMS SPANNING OVER 1,875SQF. THIS UNIT FEATURES A LARGE TERRACES OVERLOOKING THE ATLANTIC. YOUR TROPICAL OASIS AWAITS.

FULLY RENOVATED! three bedroom in seaside village. Beautiful kitchen, baths, floors, brand new windows and sliders. Spacious floor plan with three bedrooms with all in-suite baths, ground floor corner unit with oversized wrap around terrace. Tremendous revenue potential if desired. Seaside Village is zoned to allow unlimited rentals. Two car parking spaces and one golf cart parking, large storage.

WELCOME TO SEASIDE AT FISHER ISLAND. A RARE OPPORTUNITY AWAITS YOU. ONE OF THE MOST DESIRED UNIT LOCATIONS IN ALL OF SEASIDE WITH DIRECT OCEAN VIEWS FROM MAIN LIVING AREA AND MASTER BEDROOM SUITE. THIS UPDATED UNIT BOASTS 3 BEDROOMS, 2 BATHROOMS, AND OPEN CONCEPT KITCHEN SPANNING ACROSS 1, 875 SQ FT. THIS UNIT FEATURES A LARGE TERRACE OVERLOOKING THE ATLANTIC. YOUR TROPICAL OASIS AWAITS.

Spectacular 3BR unit in Bayside with gorgeous views of the Atlantic Ocean and Downtown Miami from every room. Open living spaces with chic contemporary furniture. Marble floors throughout, three separate terraces, fully equipped kitchen with the latest Stainless Steel appliances, custom bar and office/den.
